attributes.action: Abolish ALL laws of a compulsory vaccine to attend music festivals/events
attributes.additional_details: This is very important for the future of our generation and the further generations. These laws are completely and utterly disgusting and are a violation of human rights. END ALL COVID LAWS NOW
attributes.background: Stop ALL restrictions for those who are choosing not to have the vaccine or those who cannot have it for medical reasons

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
